message: can i use mongoDB with python to build big and scalable website ?

data.message: You can use almost any database and language to build a big and scalabale website.
:) i just starting in Mongo so ,   my worries about the monogo deal with data like document so if i have more relations in my DB it will affect on the CRUD operation ??
mongodb has serious problem with performance unless you are using it for a big, huge project it's fine. but if it's a small project don't use it.

As big as big can get, every stack has its set of problems to deal with when you scale. Can you scale mongo? yes, can you scale python? yes. At what cost (effort, time, sanity)? Depends.
Don't think about scalability now. There will always be a bottleneck somewhere, it'll show itself when the time comes for it.
